domain_terms.Integration Pattern: Reusable solution to common integration challenges
domain_terms.API Gateway: Single entry point for managing, securing, and routing API requests
domain_terms.Message Broker: Middleware enabling asynchronous communication between systems
domain_terms.Decouple Through Events: Pattern where systems communicate through events
domain_terms.Data Integration: Process of combining data from different sources
domain_terms.ESB: Enterprise Service Bus - centralized integration middleware
domain_terms.Choreography: Decentralized coordination where services trigger each other

framework_description: integration patterns, API design, messaging, async event decoupling, and data integration
